{"id":961150591,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 1 day","timestamp":1685558521,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/961150591/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool is_vowel(char c) {\n        switch(c) {\n            case 'a':\n            case 'e':\n            case 'i':\n            case 'o':\n            case 'u':\n            case 'A':\n            case 'E':\n            case 'I':\n            case 'O':\n            case 'U':\n                return true;\n            default:\n                return false;\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = s.size()-1;\n        while (left < right) {\n            while (left < right && !is_vowel(s[left])) left++;\n            while (left < right && !is_vowel(s[right])) right--;\n            swap(s[left], s[right]);\n            left++;\n            right--;\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false}
